resources.string:
The purpose and main aim of developing "StudySIT" app may be the missing piece of many unfinished projects, to help all the students of SIT on the parameter of acedemics.
StudySIT includes a tab as "Study Materials" providing all the suitable resources in a unified way, such as notes, past question papers,
solutions etc. in pdf format thus improving readability as well.
Another tab "Exam details" provides the actual acedemic schedule at one place for students of al branches and years.
This app has a portal of announcement done by the college.
This app features the knowledge of merit status of an individual directly through the college website.
 

App developed by :
SARTHAK MISHRA(1SI17CS097)
